entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
